org.gvsig.gazetteer.adl.languages

Class AdlLanguage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.catalog.languages.AbstractGeneralLanguage
      • org.gvsig.gazetteer.adl.languages.AdlLanguage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILanguages

    public class AdlLanguage
extends AbstractGeneralLanguage
    This class is used to create a query in the language supported by the ADL protocol
    See Also:
    http://www.alexandria.ucsb.edu/gazetteer/protocol/
